comment:
Чорда с охраной входит в Амасекус
Чорда

languages.text: "Еретики. Предатели. Отбросы, отринувшие Императора. Час воздаяния настал, ибо я — кара Его!"
"Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"
languages.original_text: "Еретики. Предатели. Отбросы, отринувшие Императора. Час воздаяния настал, ибо я — кара Его!"

traits.locale_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"
"Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"
"Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"
"Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"
"Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"
"Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

languages.text: “异端分子，人类叛徒，逃避帝皇信仰的人渣。清算的时刻到了，因为我就是祂的怒火！”
languages.original_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

traits.locale_text: “异端分子，人类叛徒，逃避帝皇信仰的人渣。清算的时刻到了，因为我就是祂的怒火！”

languages.text: 「異端者に裏切り者。全員、皇帝を敬遠するクズだ。ついに、清算の時が来た。俺が天罰を下してやる！」
languages.original_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者に裏切り者。全員、皇帝を敬遠するクズだ。ついに、清算の時が来た。俺が天罰を下してやる！」

languages.text: «Herejes. Traidores. Escoria que rehúye al Emperador. ¡Es hora del ajuste de cuentas y yo soy Su castigo!».
languages.original_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

traits.locale_text: «Herejes. Traidores. Escoria que rehúye al Emperador. ¡Es hora del ajuste de cuentas y yo soy Su castigo!».

languages.text: "Ketzer. Verräter. Imperator-lästernder Abschaum. Das jüngste Gericht ist gekommen, denn ich bin seine Vergeltung!"
languages.original_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

traits.locale_text: "Ketzer. Verräter. Imperator-lästernder Abschaum. Das jüngste Gericht ist gekommen, denn ich bin seine Vergeltung!"

languages.text: « Hérétiques. Traîtres. Vermines qui avez renié l'Empereur. L'heure de votre jugement est venue, car je suis l'incarnation de Son châtiment ! »
languages.original_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

traits.locale_text: « Hérétiques. Traîtres. Vermines qui avez renié l'Empereur. L'heure de votre jugement est venue, car je suis l'incarnation de Son châtiment ! »

languages.text: "Kâfirler. Hainler. İmparator'u yok sayan pislikler. Hesaplaşma vakti geldi! Ben de O'nun size verdiği cezayım!"
languages.original_text: "Heretics. Traitors. Emperor-shunning scum. The hour of the reckoning has come, for I am His retribution!"

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler. Hainler. İmparator'u yok sayan pislikler. Hesaplaşma vakti geldi! O'nun size verdiği ceza benim!"
